name: Pixel Pets - Art Explosion!
description:
I made this because I needed a simple tool that would allow me to quickly prototype and create Pixel Art for my game Pixel Pets!

I had originally only planned on a 16x16 canvas, but it has since been upgraded to 32x32, with plans to choose a canvas size coming in the next update.

Right now there are not too many features, as I have only added what I need for my own project. I plan to add more features in future updates and look forward to your suggestions and feedback!

I hope you enjoy my tiny Pixel Art App, may your creativity explode with new ideas!

(Saves as a .png with Transparency to the Desktop)
